name: Radial Spectrum Analysis
description: Analyzes the radially-averaged frequency spectrum for characteristic patterns. AI-generated images often show anomalous spectral profiles.
mechanism: Computes radially-averaged power spectrum and analyzes spectral profile shape. Deviations from natural profiles indicate manipulation.
parameters: FFT: adaptive, Averaging: radial bins, Metric: profile deviation
useCase: Detecting spectral anomalies in AI-generated images
